catalog.description: The catalog those Categories are in.

locale.description: Determines the language those categories is in.

is_master.description: Defines whether the imported locale is the master one. If this value is omitted, the imported locale is treated as master locale.

name.description: name of the attribute to be used when filtering in API

path.description:
JSONPath of the attribute to use to search/filter with, e.g. `$.material` will get material to filter with.
For more information about JSONPath check: http://jsonpath.com/.

weight.description: weight of the attribute in the full text search, the bigger the weight the more the attribute will matter in the search result.

name.description: name of the attribute to be used when filtering in API

path.description:
JSONPath of the attribute to use to search/filter with, e.g. `$.material` will get material to filter with.
For more information about JSONPath check: http://jsonpath.com/

shop.description: The shop those Categories are in.

locale.description: Determines the language those categories is in.

is_master.description: Defines whether the imported locale is the master one. If this value is omitted, the imported locale is treated as master locale.

name.description: name of the attribute to be used when filtering in API

path.description:
JSONPath of the attribute to use to search/filter with, e.g. `$.material` will get material to filter with.
For more information about JSONPath check: http://jsonpath.com/.

weight.description: weight of the attribute in the full text search, the bigger the weight the more the attribute will matter in the search result.

name.description: name of the attribute to be used when filtering in API

path.description:
JSONPath of the attribute to use to search/filter with, e.g. `$.material` will get material to filter with.
For more information about JSONPath check: http://jsonpath.com/

items.description: A product is a buyable item. These fields describe products and some of these fields are not used by default but can be manipulated via the NewStore SDK to be exposed in the Consumer App or the Associate App.

variant_group_id.description: The identifier of the variant group of this product.

show_in_listing.description: Determines whether this product is displayed in search results and product listings.

sku.description: The stock keeping unit number of the product. DEPRECATED: use "external_identifiers" list and move "sku" there instead.

title.description: The product title. It is most likely used for displaying purposes in the frontend.

caption.description: A short version of the product's description used for meta tags or thumbnails.

keywords.description: List of keywords describing the product. By default, this field has no effect in the NewStore applications.

is_published.description: Free boolean field to be used for custom implementations. By default, this field has no effect in the NewStore applications.

is_active.description: Free boolean field to be used for custom implementations. By default, this field has no effect in the NewStore applications.

shipping_weight_value.description: The weight of the product. Set the weight unit with 'shipping_weight_unit'.

shipping_weight_unit.description: The weight unit of the product. Set the weight with 'shipping_weight_value'.

shipping_dimension_length.description: The length of the product. Set the unit of measurement with 'shipping_dimension_unit'.

shipping_dimension_width.description: The width of the product. Set the unit of measurement with 'shipping_dimension_unit'.

shipping_dimension_height.description: The height of the product. Set the unit of measurement with 'shipping_dimension_unit'.

shipping_dimension_unit.description: The unit of measurement for the product dimensions.

extended_attributes.description: Determines a collection of key/values for custom diversification of the product.

items.title: Product Image
items.description: Contains the image data of a product.

is_main.description: Identifies the main image. The image that is considered the 'main image' is the first image of the product that consumers/associates see in the applications.

alt_text.description: The alternative text for the image, used if the image fails to be displayed.

is_color_swatch.description: Determines that this image is the representation of the color of the product.

tags.description: Tenant specific tags or use 'nwst::productonly' to override the main image coming from the catalog. This image is only displayed in the product overview of an order inside the Fulfillment app and HQ.

tax_class_id.description: An identifier representing the tax class of the product.

position.description: Position of the product inside the given category.

is_main.description: Determines that this category is the main category of the product. The main category will be used if customers get deep linked to a product. Only one category can be main and an error will be thrown if two categories are assigned. Also if no category is marked as main.

template_id.description: Determines a template that is used to display this product.

variation_color_value.description: The display name of the product's color.

variation_size_value.description: The display name of the product's size.

google_category.description: The size category of the product.

variation_size_type.description: This attribute is used to indicate the cut of the product.

variation_size_system.description: The size system this size is in.

variation_additional_1_name.description: Allows determining the name for an additional dimension for the diversification of the product on top of color and size.

variation_additional_1_value.description: Allows determining the value for an additional dimension for the diversification of the product on top of color and size.

variation_additional_2_name.description: Allows determining the name for an additional dimension for the diversification of the product on top of color and size.

variation_additional_2_value.description: Allows determining the value for an additional dimension for the diversification of the product on top of color and size.

online_from.description: Determines the datetime (inclusive) when the product is available to be sold.

online_to.description: Determines the datetime (inclusive) when the product is not available anymore to be sold.

product_hts_number.description: A six digit code specified by harmonized system for tariffs (required for international shipments).

schedule_b.description: Classification number for exporting goods out of the United States (required for international shipments).

material.description: indicates the materials the product item is produced of.
